column1: Local Foods////I was invited for a lunch meeting here and was not disappointed. I was a little if'y about coming here because I saw that vegan was the main attraction
column2: but the food was delicious. I got the chicken sandwich
column4: and fresh fruit. Everything tasted absolutely amazing. The flavors worked so well together and the fresh fruit was actually fresh. The dining layout is very nice and a great place for a quick bite or a professional meeting. The restaurant is located by Rice Village
column5: so you can get lunch and finish off with a little shopping. I will definitely be inviting some friends here for lunch.
